it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.action

Class ActionPrototype

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.action.ActionPrototype
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ActionPrototype
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Prototype of an action, created when a bonus action occurs, has to be put in the player to be later better defined by the game logic
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
